'''Guselnikov''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|The Rainbow Destined to Burn}}.

==Profile==
Guselnikov is a [[Fatui]] soldier who's a part of [[Capitano]]'s forces. During the war in {{Quest|The Rainbow Destined to Burn}}, as per Capitano's order, he was temporarily placed under the Pyro Archon's command.

===Appearance===
Guselnikov takes the appearance of a [[Fatui Skirmisher - Geochanter Bracer]].
